description: Episode of Series "Marriage and Family Living". A social guidance docu-drama promoting restraint against premarital sex. After nearly succumbing to her boyfriend's advances, teenager Laurie seeks her mother's advice. Following a sensible discussion with her mother and the lesson provided by her friend Eileen, a victim of her physical urges, Laurie considers the long term consequences of sexual temptation.
